page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT WEST PLEAN
page.content: Much of the entertainment at West Plean revolves around the school. Parents and friends are invited to Social evenings and concerts in the school. They also accompany the children on trips to the seaside and recently went for a sail on the paddle steamer, The Waverley from Grangemouth to Inchcolm Island. At Christmas there is a visit to the MacRobert Centre to a pantomime. Every term the senior pupils entertain the patients at the Larbert Hospital. We sing, dance, play the recorder and bagpipes. Many of the families now have videos and computers for home entertainment.
